website_summaries.verdict: This duo of Pantene shampoo and conditioner will gently cleanse your hair and lock in moisture to leave your locks feeling strong and beautiful.
pros: Pro-V hydrating conditioner has a blend of nutrients to replenish dry hair from root to tip
Leaves hair feeling soft and silky
Large bottles last a long time and the price is affordable, giving you a great value
cons: Some don't like the scent of the shampoo

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair fall out in chunks plus its not sulfate free!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never been a fan of pantene but read some good reviews and decided to try this shampoo and conditioner set especially because it said it was sulfate free... At first it made my hair shiny that was after the first wash.. Then After the second wash my hair started to fall out in chunks and It makes me mad cause I was already growing it out I was left with my hair being all thinned out and i lost about 2 inches in length..please do not buy this shampoo and conditioner its crap! There are better options out there and cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Love

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for many years
customer_reviews.text: My fav, go-to shampoo and conditioner for years. I occasionally add another brand but always go back to Pantene. Products 4x the price don’t work as well! I’ve used Purology, Tea Tree Paul Mitchell, Aveda, etc, always go back to this!
customer_reviews.author: Mequon Katie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Asked for a sulfate free product. Which this is not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pantene smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of Pantene. I just wish my hair would take Pantene but my husbands do. I thought that the price was definitely competitive. The one thing I do love about using Pantene conditioner is my hair is tangle free after use. This is the only conditioner that does this. If you hate tangled hair and are looking for shampoo and conditioner that helps then I would recommend Pantene.
customer_reviews.author: Momma❤️Deals

customer_reviews.title: Same as in-stores
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if I'd have time to stop at the store and I was running low on shampoo so I decided to order this shampoo/conditioner pack. It arrived within 2 days with prime shipping and is exactly as advertised. This is my default shampoo/conditioner for days I'm not using specialty shampoo/conditioners (e.g., for color treated hair, dry scalp, etc.). It's worked well for me over the years and I recommend it for anybody looking for a no-fuss product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Hair looks shiny
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. For the price it's a great deal - it makes my hair look nice and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t notice too much of a difference in moisture
customer_reviews.text: I don’t feel like this shampoo and conditioner really moisturize my hair as well as a few other products I’ve used but it smells great and leaves my hair nice and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Save your hair, buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Pantene and hadn’t used it in a while. Not sure if it was the sulfate free version, but the shampoo for dry hair actually made my hair super dry and brittle. My mom complained my hair looked like straw. She has never complained about my hair and I am 45. Two coconut oil treatments didn’t help. Switching shampoos did. I’ll never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Disliked it
customer_reviews.text: A lot of my hair were coming off when using this shampoo, never happened when i use other brand smh
customer_reviews.author: Junting Weng

customer_reviews.title: Corrected Crisp, Stiff Hair
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's hair was stiff like it had shellac in it. I washed and conditioned it with another product and it didn't help at all. I used an expensive conditioner and it worked only as long as I left it in. I tried this shampoo and her hair dried soft and shiny. I'm glad this was all that was necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Not Sulphate Free.
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertising. It says the conditioner is sulphate free but it is NOT. Do not buy this. Totally misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Lewisson

customer_reviews.title: Not nourishing for hair
customer_reviews.text: The bad packaging (make it leaks a little) could be overlooked if they work. But they didn’t !! 1st of all, the smell does not retain after showering. 2nd, The shampoo felt like water down. 3rd, Having done shampoo And conditioner does not make a different, my hair is not smooth or nourished . In fact i think they make my hair drier ; I also have itchy scalp as a result of these.
customer_reviews.author: BeMeo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- COUNTERFEIT GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Pantene for years and This month I decided to buy it from Amazon because I’ve been in quarantine... one week after using it chunks of my hair have been falling out and my scalp is always itching and feels like its on fire this has never happened to me before :(
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for $12.99. That absolutely destroys the price of these two products combined at the local pharmacy. Good buy. (Note that the bottle isn't full. Both are only about 90% full which is infuriating. But everyone who makes shampoo/conditioner does this so no star deduction.)
customer_reviews.author: Payton Prentiss

customer_reviews.title: Really does moisturized hair
customer_reviews.text: I really like Pantene products. Its been a challenge to find a shampoo/conditioner that will not dry out my natural 4a hair. This makes my scalp feel clean and my hair moisturized. Plus the scent last all day even after blow drying.. i found a new favorite
customer_reviews.author: Whitzshopn

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money,  large size bottles
customer_reviews.text: Large sizes so you getting alot of product. I'm happy with the product. Ithe smells good but I haven't tried it on my hair yet. Will come back and give an update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: Great but it WILL WEIGH YOUR THIN HAIR DOWN
customer_reviews.text: Pantene is a great product, but I have thin hair.. And as much as I love it and need the conditioning, unfortunately, the conditioner DOES weigh thin hair DOWN... SO I can wash my hair at night before bed and the next morning when I get up, I need to wash it again because it SO greasy and just gunked up from the thickness of the conditioner... I can't stand my hair to be so heavily weighed down from. Conditioner like I need to wash my hair out again because it feels greasy and dirty... So I may have to find a light weight conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can purchase my favorite Pantene shampoo and conditioner from Amazon. It comes protected with sealed plastic. A better buy than any store. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: Was using something that cost 3 times as much and didn't do anything more for my hair!
customer_reviews.author: VickiA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described: smells great, makes my hair (usually oily or frizzy) really soft, and one bottle of shampoo and one bottle of conditioner lasts me and my sister a month between the both of us
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Came with both shampoo and conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly was described, both Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal shampoo and conditioner in the large sizes, which is great because it is so hard nowadays to find this specific shampoo and conditioner in store since it is always out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: A. C

customer_reviews.title: Shouldnt be used for long
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product. However I wouldnt recommend using it daily. This product has a tendency to build up in your hair due to the chemicals that are in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the way this works on her hair. It smells nice and cleans her hair comfortably when many other shampoos and conditioners cause her scalp to itch
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Bottle design not functional
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine. Shampoo and conditioner that I like. But I wish I knew the conditioner bottle stands upside down on its cap...which doesn't close properly and even if it did the weight of the liquid inside tends to make it fall over and you lose conditioner leaking over shower floor..... I won't buy again due to design of bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: The Shampoo is FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Dosent seem like its Pantene. Dosent even smell like Pantene shampoo. The condition is good. But i dont think the shampoo is real Pantene. I love this product for my natural hair.

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: made my hair smell so nice that several people remarked about how good it smells. also made it so soft.

customer_reviews.title: Arrive pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: It arrived pretty quick, real product, not a knock off. It came packaged together as one unit which made for easy storage until I need it. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DAN H

customer_reviews.title: Doable
customer_reviews.text: Seems all Pantene products tend to flatten my hair. Like the shampoo but conditioner is a bit heavy. However, I have extremely thick hair. So far, color treated respectful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good product and customer service! I highly recommend this seller. I pray you’re all safe and healthy during this difficult time. GOD bless you!!!

customer_reviews.title: It's shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Pantene is a common enough brand I'm sure I don't need to tell you about it. The value for money made this a good deal.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING

I used to use wella and it was so expensive but this is way better! I keep seeing reviews about people hair falling out?? WTF is wrong with your hair?? It’s not the shampoo and conditioner that’s for damn sure!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing Shampoo and Conditioner is great stuff I look forward to using this on me dry hair. Will worth the buy

customer_reviews.title: Look at the reviews of your favorite product. This is just better.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wasting my money on expensive “product” for years. I finally went back to this and I’ve got my hair back. My hair fine, frizzy and wavy. This makes it so soft and style easily. I really missed it.

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe value for money!!!

customer_reviews.title: Works for some.

product_meta.title: Pantene Moisturizing Shampoo and Conditioner for Dry Hair, Daily Moisture Renewal, Bundle Pack
product_meta.description: Style Name:Shampoo + Conditioner KitPantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo puts in more than it takes out with every wash. With a potent blend of Pro-V nutrients, Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo gently cleanses your hair with a nutrient-rich lather that wraps every strand with strength. The Pro-V formula delivers 2X moisture,* so you’re left with intensely hydrated, strong and beautiful hair. Renew your hair with Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Conditioner. Featuring a potent blend of Pro-V nutrients, this luxurious cream helps to visibly replenish dry, lifeless hair from root to tip. Micro-moisturizers work to wrap every strand with lasting hydration, leaving your hair with 2X more moisture.* The result? Beautifully soft, manageable strands.*when used as a system with Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo and Conditioner based on moisturized feel vs. non-conditioning shampoo.
feature_bullets: You will receive (1) 25.4 ounces Shampoo and (1) 24 ounce conditioner
SHAMPOO LOCKS IN HYDRATION from root to tip as part of the Daily Moisture Renewal system
MOISTURIZING CONDITIONER leaves hair silky soft, manageable, and strong against damage
PARABEN FREE FORMULA safe for color and chemically treated hair
CONDITIONS WITHOUT WEIGH DOWN great for all hair types

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
